articles.title: Australia's Bapcor rejects Bain Capital's $1.2 billion bid; appoints new CEO By Reuters - Investing.com

articles.content: Investing.com-- The S&P 500 closed at a record high Tuesday for the fifth-straight session as testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell didn't sway investors from bets on a first rate cu… [+2698 chars]
